title: Screen Resolution/Client Bugged
body:
After champion select, when the game switches to the game client window, my whole screen goes black and just says:
"Not Optimum Mode
Recommended Mode:
1680x1050     60Hz
Problem is, I AM in 1680x1050, 60Hz. I've checked it over and over, even changed away from and back to the setting, still get the same message. Please help!
I don't know if it matters or not, but I had LoL on an old computer about a year ago and stopped playing. Just re-downloaded today on a new computer to get back into it. But all the in-game graphics settings I used on my old comp were the lowest settings (free way to decent fps), so I wouldn't think it would make any difference now.

replies.body:
Can you still hear in-game sounds despite the black screen?  It sounds like you're connected just fine, but something like a bad driver is failing to render the game.  As a start, reset your config settings in case it's set to an unsupported resolution.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Test it in a custom to be sure!  If it persists, go through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide as well to tune up your pc settings, drivers, and game files as well.  I hope that helps!

I checked and heard the in-game sounds. So I closed out the game, re-opened it, logged in, followed your steps to delete the 2 files, started a custom, and the same thing happened; black screen, same error. Were the steps you gave the process for resetting the config settings? IDK if it helps, but this is my monitor: https://www.cnet.com/products/samsung-syncmaster-2232bw-lcd-monitor-22/specs/

Thanks for the update on this!  The FPS guide has a series of different steps to help rule out possibilities like bad drivers or game files.  Resetting your config was an additional step that's not included in the guide.  

If the steps don't help out, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can work with you individually to see what exactly is going on.  Just be sure to go through the FPS guide first, as it's likely to fix this up!

Thanks! I found out that if I hit "alt+enter" at the black screen, it loads up the game in "window mode". I can switch to "borderless" and still play just fine, but the "full screen" option takes it back to black. Seems to just be something in the resolution settings, but I'm not very techy, and I have a work-around, so I consider this solved. Don't believe it was an issue with the game. Thanks for all your help, Porocles. Rito has at least some great guys working for them. :)
